accuracy.description: Correctness of the answers provided by the system

completeness.description: Degree to which the multi-agent system's answer fully addresses the question

efficiency.description: The amount of computational resources and time used by the system to arrive at an answer

logical_coherence.description: The degree to which the reasoning trace is consistent and logical

reliability.description: Consistency of the system's performance over time

robustness.description: Ability of the system to handle diverse and complex questions without errors

originality.description: The uniqueness of the answers, indicating that they are not taken directly from data sources such as the internet

traceability.description: The ability to review and understand the reasoning process or steps taken by the system to arrive at an answer

complexity_management.description: How well does the system manage and process the complexity inherent in the task

data_contamination_prevention.description: Effectiveness of the system in preventing data contamination from unreliable sources
